position.marginalia_text: Loci propria natura est ex stellis ibi existentibus, vel in eodem circulo ascendentibus, vel ex seipsa, vel domina[n]tis planeta[e] seg 3. aphor. 98.

marginalia.translation: The particular nature of a position is from where the stars appear, either ascending in the same circle, or from themselves or the dominance of a planet. Sergius of Reshaina 3. More apt 98.

position.marginalia_text: Si Septima significat morte[m], inimicos, et rixas, quid caus[a]e est cur et vxores significat [.] Aut fateri [de]bemus co[n]iugam in se qua[m]da[m] co[n]trarietate[m] [co[n]traxa[m]] habere, aut r[ati]o diversitatis redde[n]da. Vide igitur Artemidoru[m] in so[m]nijs de morte et co[n]iugis.

marginalia.translation: If the seventh signifies death, hostilities, and disputes, what cause is there why it even signifies wifes? Or should we admit that a wife in itself has a certain incurred misfortune, or the reason of diversity must be restored. Therefore see Artemidorus Daldianus in dreams on death and spouses.
